definition: noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: Would you like to go for a meal, then? We could go to that super restaurant downtown.
sentences.chinese: 那么去吃饭好吗？我们可以到闹区的那家高级餐厅。

sentences.english: Let's go downtown and go window shopping.
sentences.chinese: 我们到闹区去逛橱窗不花钱。

sentences.english: They are in town to drum up resources for the mainland's travel enthusiasts.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在商业闹区向大陆旅游爱好者推广旅游资源。

sentences.english: The little girl was cut down in a gun fight in downtown toronto.
sentences.chinese: 那个小女孩在多伦多闹区的枪战中失去生命。

sentences.english: I have easy access to many shops from my apartment downtown.
sentences.chinese: 从我位于闹区的公寓很容易就能到达许多商店。

sentences.english: Female students with their bodies painted protest in downtown Medellin, Colombia, May 15, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 全身彩绘的女学生在哥伦比亚梅德林闹区抗议。

definition: Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
Jiepang (Chinese location-based social networking service for mobile devices, in operation 2010-2016)
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
